markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diverse Recognition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2227) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 40</row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871); master in a skill used to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26)

**Trigger**
You successfully [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about a creature you can see, using a skill in which you are a master.

</column>

---

Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats. Attempt to Recall Knowledge against a different kind of creature you can see using the same skill. You must still meet the requirements to attempt this check.
name: Diverse Recognition
prerequisite: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
prerequisite_markdown: [Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871); master in a skill used to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26)
